WorkItem.Description:
With Rawr 2.3.22 when I check off Hunter's mark in the buffs tab it automatically unchecks it. 
I'm trying to simulate having 2 hunters in the raid where the other is marking and I am not. Due to it instantly unchecking I also cant mark it as improved or anything either.

Comments.Message:
please show me the duplicate.
http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/18607
the only one i found referencing the hunter's mark was the issue above, it is not the same issue.

The website can easily be searched, and you don't just search open issues.
http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/18583

On the issue tracker I looked up "Hunter's Mark" and "Hunter Mark" and did not find Work item 18583.  I did my search before posting something new as I have always done. Not my fault, it's only the 4th issue I post and didn't realize that codeplex defaults at searching Open Issues vs. All Issues. :P
